statements: DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE technician_id = 50 AND schedule_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM Technicians WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer' AND purchase_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine';
DELETE FROM EquipmentAssignments WHERE assignment_id = 500 AND technician_id = 201;
